data.title: Unmanned Aircraft System (UAS) Mapping
data.meta_description: UAS (aka Drone) Surveys and MappingUnmanned Aircraft Systems (UAS), or drones, have become an incredibly powerful data acquisition tool. From simple aerial photography to complex surveying and mapping, UAS technology increases the efficiency of these tasks and is literally taking engineering capabilities to new heights.
data.text:
UAS (aka Drone) Surveys and Mapping

Unmanned Aircraft Systems (UAS), or drones, have become an incredibly powerful data acquisition tool. From simple aerial photography to complex surveying and mapping, UAS technology increases the efficiency of these tasks and is literally taking engineering capabilities to new heights.

Sigma FAA-Licensed for UAS Services:

FAA Section 333 Exemption / Part 107 compliant

Remote Pilot Certified Operators

Sport Pilot certified UAS operators

Registered UAS with “N” number

Covered by UAS-specific insurance policy

Sigma Offers Complete Range of UAS Services:

Aerial Photography / Video Services

Construction documentation

Planimetric Mapping

Orthorectified Imagery

Digital surface model for topography and volumetric analysis

GIS Integration

Aerial Photography / Video Services

UAS technology gives The Sigma Group’s clients in Milwaukee and beyond access to an important range of applications including building inspection, construction documentation, surveying, building modeling, and real estate marketing. Organizations leveraging UAS recognize the return on investment and efficiency. Clients new to UAS are often immediately impressed by its capabilities and cost-saving potential.

Woodland Prime Business Park Aerial Tour

We understand that each client is unique and that effective use of UAS technology helps address specific operational environment and challenges.
